alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 11 at 8:11PM MDT until May 12 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MDT FRIDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA COUNTY... At 811 PM MDT, gauge reports indicate that thunderstorms have produced heavy rain across the warned area. The emergency manager has reported that flooding is ongoing in portions southeastern Oglala Lakota County. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pine Ridge, Porcupine, Kyle, Manderson, Wounded Knee, Batesland, Porcupine Butte Housing, Evergreen, Sharps Corner, Goose Neck Housing, Thunder Valley, Wolf Creek Housing, Lonesome Valley, Calico, Kyle North Route Housing, Wakpamni, Number 4 and Pine Ridge Reservation. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
